Sentencas: The aim of the presented study was to deposit protective-conducting Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings on the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel by means of electrophoresis and to evaluate their physicochemical properties after high-temperature oxidation under thermal cycling conditions.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: When the Crofer 22 H steel - whether uncoated or coated with the two spinels - was oxidized in 48-h cycles involving a temperature of either 750 or 800 degrees C, its oxidation kinetics approximately obeyed the parabolic rate law.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: The oxidation rate observed for uncoated steel was higher than that for the studied coating/steel systems.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: The Fe-doped spinel coating material improved the oxidation resistance of steel to a higher degree than the undoped spinel coating.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: The obtained bulk spinels exhibited a regular phase composition and high electrical conductivity, while the Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 coatings were dual-phase, compact, and exhibited good adhesion to the metallic substrate.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: The area-specific resistance values measured for the steel/coating systems indicate that the coatings significantly improve the electrical properties of the studied ferritic steel, especially at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: The conducted research confirmed the suitability of theMn(1.45)Co(1.45) Fe0.1O4
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties

Sentencas: and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinels as coatings on the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel to be applied in the production of interconnects used in intermediate-temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: High-temperature oxidation of the Crofer 22 H ferritic steel with Mn1.45Co1.45 Fe0.1O4 and Mn1.5Co1.5O4 spinel coatings under thermal cycling to conditions and its properties
